title: Galaxy S22 Ultra teardown shows off the S Pen slot, waterproofing measures [Video]
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra has been available for a couple of weeks now, and so far, the verdict is that of a solid contender. To add, it looks like the quality isn’t just surface deep in this Galaxy S22 Ultra teardown.

more…

The post Galaxy S22 Ultra teardown shows off the S Pen slot, waterproofing measures [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The S22 Ultra is a solid phone, inside and out. This Galaxy S22 Ultra teardown gives a great look at the phone in all its watertight glory.
